item.description:
Herb Pearce is going to be leading a relaxing workshop about ways to alleviate obsessive thinking. Here is a description of the event from Herb:

“Understand what obsessive thinking is and ways to remedy the pain that accompanies it. We'll practice techniques that will be useful for clearer and more choiceful thinking and being in charge of your thinking.”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring our own food as long as it is vegetarian.

Great company, meaningful conversation and learning how to improve our lives at the same time! A great way to spend Friday night with friends!
item.name: Obsessive Thinking and Ways to Alleviate It
